The researcher of the Qurâ€™an and what it built, that is: whoever built it, and the arousal of what is on the will of the description of the description of what was presented in and what was born as if it was said: and the great and the great Its existence and the amount of its ability to build them and what is meant by it is to find it in terms of it indicates that and it is inferred from it, and it is first of its interpretation of it.Likewise, the words are in his words: the earth and what it has grieved, that is: its simplicity from every side and its length as its toil, and it will be a flour in the sense of gold as the saying The tiredness of the youth is an era.It is said: a flour, a flour, a flour, a flour.
